turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Do you have time to order me a drink from Starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, I do. Do you want it from the one on Rt. 224 in Boardman?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that's fine. Get me a Cafe Moccha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure. What size do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let's go with the Grande.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want whipped cream on it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is 2% milk fine?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that's ok.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want this order for now or a set time later?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Now is fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Should they add any nuts or something else to it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's not necessarily. How much sugar is in that drink?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It says 4 grams on the menu. Go ahead and order it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, read it back to me.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 1 Grande Caffe Mocha, 2% milk, whipped cream, no nuts/extras, for order right now at the Rt. 224 location in Boardman.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Awesome. Send it out.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Just put it in. Check your email for confirmation or order and pick up time. Do you want me to pick it up for you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's ok. I'll pick it up. I just got the confirmation email. Thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome. Will there be anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's it for now. Talk to you later. Bye.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Bye.
